def_cn: 头重脚轻的;上重下轻的
def_en: Something that is top-heavy is larger or heavier at the top than at the bottom, and might therefore fall over.

def_cn: 高级官员过多的;行政管理人员过多的
def_en: If you describe a business or other organization as top-heavy, you mean that it has too many senior managers in relation to the number of junior managers or workers.
